you_denied: You denied location permission. You need to allow permission to use this service.

maintenance_text: We are currently performing some schedule maintenance. We will be back as soon as possible. Please check back soon.

any_query_feel_free_to_call: Any Query? Feel free to call or mail us
our_system_currently_undergoing_maintena: Our system is currently undergoing maintenance to bring you an even tastier experience. Hang tight while we make the dishes
while_in_use_permission_message: To provide you with accurate delivery tracking and real-time updates, we need access to your location while you are using the app. This helps us show your current location on the map, provide accurate delivery ETAs, and ensure seamless order tracking.
always_allow_permission_message: To ensure uninterrupted delivery tracking, even when the app is in the background or your phone is locked, we need access to your location at all times. This allows us to continuously track your location during deliveries, provide real-time updates to customers, and improve delivery efficiency and accuracy.
privacy_assurance_message: Your privacy is important to us. We only use your location data for delivery purposes and never share it with third parties. You can change these permissions anytime in your device settings.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_permanent_delet: Are you sure you want to permanent delete ?
location_sharing_disabled_top_here_to_en: Location sharing disabled. Tap here to enable to provide accurate delivery tracking
to_allow_go_to_settings: To allow, go to Settings > Permissions > Location > Allow all the time.
in_change_for_the_customer_when_making_t: in change for the customer when making the delivery
to_provide_accurate_delivery_tracking: To provide accurate delivery tracking and updates, we need access to your location.
show_your_live_location_on_the_map: Show your live location on the map.
ensure_seamless_tracking_even_in: Ensure seamless tracking (even in background/locked mode.)
your_location_is_only_used_for: Your location is only used for delivery and never shared with third parties
allow_the_app_to_run_in_the: Allow the app to run in the background for better accuracy.
location_is_off_tap_to_enable: Location is off. Tap to enable for accurate tracking.
allow_background_location_for_better_acc: Allow background location for better accuracy.
notification_are_disabled_please_allow_n: Notification is disabled. Please Allow notification
notification_are_disable_and_allow_backg: Notification are disabled & Allow background location for better accuracy. Please Allow from settings
notification_and_location_are_disabled_p: Notification & Location  are disabled. Please Allow from settings
all_your_personal_data_will_be_removed: All your personal data will be removed permanently.
you_couldnot_delete_your_account_while_d: You can’t delete your account while deliveries are in progress.
login_to_your_account_to_view_all_delive: Login to your account to view all deliveries
upload_jpg_png_and_less_than: Upload jpg, jpeg or png & Less than
are_you_sure_you_want_to_exit: Are you sure you want to exit?
tracking_your_location_on_background: Tracking your location on background to provide customer with accurate delivery tracking and real-time updates. You can change these permissions anytime in your device settings.
please_allow_location_access:
Please allow location access to connect to your orders for precise tracking and a better experience.

You previously disabled access. To enable it, go to your device settings and allow location access for this app.
